availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of James Queen and Elizabeth Boone Queen. Married to Susan E. Hayden in Nelson County in May 1842. Father of Edward Queen. Married to Hettie Smith Queen. Father of Mary Queen and Pearley Queen. Resident of Nelson County in 1840. Merchant in Nelson County in 1850. Employed Lewis Queen and Lee Queen as clerks in Nelson County in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1860. Merchant in Nelson County in 1860. Owned seven enslaved persons in Nelson County in 1860.
